edu.first.robot

Class IterativeRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.first.robot.IterativeRobot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RobotMode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IterativeRobotAdapter

    public abstract class IterativeRobot
extends java.lang.Object
implements RobotMode
    Main class representing an "iterative" style robot mode. This is the same idea as edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.IterativeRobot, but without any of the RobotBase parts attached. The basic idea is that there are methods called 50 times per second for each game mode, each doing different things in different modes. This class is meant to be extended, to make its RobotMode methods visible.
    Since:
    May 07 13

        public IterativeRobot(java.lang.String name)
        Constructs the robot mode using the name to show the user. The name should be recognizable, like "Defensive Mode" or "Single Driver Mode".
